title: nIyE kaNkoNDu pAraDi rAdhE
sahitya:
nIyE kaNkoNDu pAraDi rAdhE rAdhE nirmalan ena nI 
uraitta mAdhavan lIlaigaL sheiginra kOlAhalam ellAm


anupallavi

  tUya yamunait-turaitanilE shOlaiyiDaiyinilE tOyum muzhumatiyin 
nilavinilE tuNivODu Adum rAsa lIlaigaL tagudiyaTradena manadaghaTra ini


caraNam    iniyadAga varum iLam tenralinUDu engengum paravum kuzhalishaiyinilE matimayangi tanai marandu 
uLam niraindu gOpiyarADavum madu viririndozhugum vaNNa mAmalarin maNam kamazhum kuzhalazhagiyar 
palaruDan kUDiyum naTamADiyum ishai pADiyum uravADiyum oLirvadai oru nAngum aindum idazh viriyum 
tAmaraiyin madu nugharum karuvaNDO mazhai mughilO ena manam kavara tulangum ezhil ilangavarum mukundanaiyE
